com.radirius.mercury.utilities

Interface Wipeable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicEntity, GameObject, Particle, ShapedEntity

    public interface Wipeable
    An abstraction for objects that can 'wipe' themselves, or self destruct.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void wipe()
      Wipes the object.
      boolean wiped()
